actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to proclaim the week of February 16-22, 1982 and every year hereafter as national "League of United Latin American Citizen's (LULAC) Week."

summary.text: Requests the President to designate the week of February 16 through February 22, 1982, and every year thereafter, as national "League of United Latin American Citizens (LULAC) Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President of the United States to proclaim the week of February 16-22, 1982 and every year hereafter as national "League of United Latin American Citizen's (LULAC) Week."
